name: Conjured Cultivation Companions
description:
***PULL WIZARD TO START***

A wacky and hectic coop game where you escort your Wizard body around the garden, while they collect the herbs required for his latest Alchemy project. 

The game is playable in coop with the following setups:

Keyboard + Controller OR Controller + Controller

WASD or Analog stick for Movement

Spacebar (Keyboard), A Button (Xbox Controller) or Cross/X (Playstation Controller) for Interacting with the tools or dead plants.

Follow the Wizard around with both Conjured Mage hands and use the proper tools to pacify the plants (Redirecting Fire, Melting Ice, or Slicing Arcane Plants).

Left a tool behind? High-five each other to summon them back to you.

Wizard get struck by a dangerous plant? Give him a slap to get him moving again.

After pacifying harmful plants you can instruct the Wizard to clear the roots to them by pressing the interact key near them, so you will not need to interact with them in the following day.
